LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_CyberneticDomination_Lette: {0} has fallen under the influence of SHODAN.\n\nIncapacitate them to break her hold on their mind.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_LetterDes: A cyberattack has hit the colony. Much of the colony's gfrid has been overloaded at the worst possible time, damaging key infrastructure while SHODAN's forces are closing in.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_LightsOff: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at light fixtures within the colony- any infected source of illumination will be shut down for a while.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_Productio: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at powered production, causing any infected work table to be shut down for a while.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_ClimateSu: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at temporarily shutting down infected HVAC systems.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_Overclock: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This one appears to increase the clock rate of processors massively, degrading the integrity of any hacked building over time.
LanguageData.Zomuro_SHODAN_ColonySubversion_IFF_Lette: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one tampers with the Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) systems of any infected turret, turning it against the colony temporarily.
